name: Walkr: Fitness Space Adventure
description:
Get aboard the fantastic spaceship of Walkr and start your adventure through the infinite cosmos. In a rocket built by an 11-year-old genius, “walking energy” will be used to fuel your ship, allowing you to discover 50 fascinating planets such as Apple Caramel, Octopus Cave, Heart on Fire and more! Across the universe, you'll find delightful lost space creatures that will need your help along the way. It really is the adventure you've been waiting for!

Walkr is the second game in a series of health-conscious games by Fourdesire, the same creators of Plant Nanny, a fun sim that reminds users to drink water daily, and now has over 2 million players!

= FEATURES =

  • FREE TO PLAY

  • Build your own galaxy and find new ways to increase your population

  • Explore the constantly expanding infinite universe

  • Carry out quests to help various friendly creatures across the galaxy find their homes

  • Visit and say hi to your galaxy friends

  • Grow with Walkr: Get over 50 awesome prizes and show them off in your gallery.

= CONVERT EVERY STEP INTO ENERGY =

  • Just put your phone in your pocket, and Walkr will automatically record the number of steps you take and convert them into "walking energy" for your spaceship

  • Walkr tracks and records your daily calorie burn and recommends a daily goal

Doubt or suggestion? We would love to know! You can contact us via email: support@fourdesire.com
